title: Implement slice[:] syntax
body:
Its a little tiny feature request. Instead of using the bit awkward a[0:] notation 
to indicate taking slice of the whole array, just support a[:]. 

Reference:
http://groups.google.com/group/golang-
nuts/browse_thread/thread/c57cfa6606e4677f/6081566b9dd94f8c?
lnk=gst&q=i3dmaster#6081566b9dd94f8c
